title: Correction to: PECTATE LYASE LIKE12 patterns the guard cell wall to coordinate turgor pressure and wall mechanics for proper stomatal function in Arabidopsis
content: This is a correction to: Yintong Chen, Wenlong Li, Joseph A. Turner, Charles T.
